definitions.text: the cardinal number that is the product of 10 and 100
a piano with the strings on a horizontal harp-shaped frame; usually supported by three legs
of behavior that is impressive and ambitious in scale or scope
extraordinarily good or great ; used especially as intensifiers
examples: a fantastic trip to the Orient
a marvelous collection of rare books
had a rattling conversation about politics

definitions.text: of high moral or intellectual value; elevated in nature or style; ; - Oliver Franks
examples: argue in terms of high-flown ideals

definitions.text: large and impressive in physical size or extent
examples: the bridge is a grand structure

definitions.text: the most important and magnificent in adornment
used of a person's appearance or behavior; befitting an eminent person
